name: Rambo: First Blood Part II (C64) Remake
name_original: Rambo: First Blood Part II (C64) Remake
description:
Not an easy game, I tried to match the original difficulty. It's a short game if you know what you are doing. About 5 minutes of gameplay.
To quit the game you have to use ALT+F4! I didn't know where to put a quit option, so I left it out.

Gameplay:
You need to rescue a P.O.W. from the camp then head to the heilcopter. After that the game tells your next objectives.

Sources:
Some models were used from GTA:SA, GTA:VC
More info in the readme file.

Minimum system requirements:
- Windows XP SP2 or newer
- .Net Framework 4.0
- 512 MB RAM
- 2.0 Ghz CPU
- Nvidia 9500 GT
- 120 MB free space
- 60 MB after install
